title: GeeSoul Electric Spin Scrubber, 13 in 1 Electric Cleaning Brush, Large Power with 2 Adjustable Speeds, Shower Cleaner Brush for Bathroom, Tub, Toilet, Kitchen
features: [11 Interchangeable Brush Heads & Hook Storage] GeeSoul electric scrubber for cleaning, attached with a hook for hanging the brush and 11 interchangeable brush heads. Different brush heads fit for different cleaning areas. Large and small flat brush for tiles, floor, bathtub, toilets. Corner brush suit for tile grout, edges, cracks. There are 8 fabric brushes on felt disc, which are great for wooden floors, furniture, windows and car cleaning. Please check the detailed installation instructions as an instruction manual.

Detachable & Adjustable Handle:GeeSoul electric rotary scrubber with extendable and removable stainless steel handle. The extendable handles can be adjusted from 16-37.5 inches, which helps not bend down for cleaning purposes. Brush dimensions: 21 x 11 x 6.2 cm (without handle and brush head). It is lightweight, which makes the whole process so much more comfortable and efficient.

[2 Speed Settings & Type C Quick Charging] GeeSoul shower cleaning brush makes cleaning easy and efficient. Design in 2 spin speeds, level 2.5 cm low speed - 300 rpm; level 5.1 cm high speed - 400 rpm. Press the power button and start rotating. Always turn from level 1 speed, briefly press the button switch to level 2 speed. Type-C charging cable is attached for fast charging. Charge for about 3 hours and support 90 minutes working time. (Type C charging cable included, but power supply not included)

FEATURES OF ELECTRIC CLEANING BRUSH GeeSoul electric cleaning brush is easy to handle, multifunctional and more efficient in cleaning household chores. Supports 2 spin speeds (level 1 - 300 rpm, level 2 - 400 rpm); 11 interchangeable brushes; adjustable extension handle; 90 minutes working time; hook attached for storage.

5. [The Bathroom Accessories Set Include] Electric Cleaning Brush * 1pc, Extension Handle * 1pc, Corner Brush * 1pc, Small Flat Brush * 1pc, Large Flat Brush * 1pc, Felt Disc * 1pc, Sponge Brush * 2pc, Wool-like Brush * 2pc, Scouring Brush * 2pc, Polyester Cloth Brush * 2pc, Hook * 1pc, Type-C Charging Cable * 1pc, User Manual * 1pc
